Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Hini na nina bakholwayo! Xa nihlangana nomkhosi wotshaba, qinani ngokuchasene nabo, nikhumbule igama lika-Allâh kakhulu khon’ukuze nibe nempumelelo
Kananjalo thobelani uAllâh noMthunywa waKhe, ningaphikisani, hleze nityhafe nimkelwe nangamandla, yibani nomonde. Inene uAllâh Unabo banomonde (banyamezelayo)
Ningabi njengabo baphuma emizini yabo beqhayisa khon’ukuze babonwe ngabantu, bathintele abantu bangangeni eNdleleni ka-Allâh; ukanti uAllâh nguMrhangqeli wako konke oko bakwenzayo

Yabonani uShaytân wenza izenzo zabo ezingcolileyo zaba ngathi zilungile kubo wathi kubo: “Akukho mntu ebantwini onokunoyisa nina namhlanje. Yaye mna ndingummelwane wenu (ndiya kuba nani ndinincedise).” Kodwa yathi yakujamelana imikhosi yomibini, wabaleka wemka yena esithi: “Inene mna andinanto yakwenza nani. Inene mna ndibona eningakuboniyo nina. Inene mna ndiyamoyika uAllâh kuba uAllâh Ubuhlungu esohlwayweni”
